body.p: Whereas it appearing that at the Febry term of the Trigg Circuit Court 1863. One Jno F Meredith being therin charged with felony Misdemeanor & being permitted to get bail for his appearance at the next August term of said Court & thereupon said Meredith together with W. H. Sims & Jno R Grace his sureties entered into recognizance in open Court in the sum of One Hundred Dollars Conditiond & for the appearance of said Meredith in said Court to answer Said charge at said August term 1863. & said Meredith being called failing to appear said Recognizance was forfeited. & Whereas your petitioner think that the cause presents Claims for Executive interposition they pray a release & discharge from the effects of said forfeiture. The circumstances must be explained by Mr A. B. Dryer Our Sheriff

Jany 15. 64
W. H. Sims
Jno R Grace

Trigg Cir Ct
